item.title: Why is this command not working? :O
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

[code]}
if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“kill”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerManager.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) Server.PlayerManager.Players[otherPIndex];
                                            c.lowGFX(78,0);
                                            c.lowGFX(451,0);
                    c.playerkilled = 1;
                    c.Send("You have been killed by the awesome power of" + playerName);
                    sM("You have killed "+c.playerName+"");
                    yell(c.otherPlayerName+" has been killed by "+ c.playerName);
                                      } else { 
                   Send("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
		}[/code]

I do get 25 errors… ;s

(using hybrid pvp v3 )
